programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in -odac -iadc ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o dumpk.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
; Initialize the global variables. sr = 44100 kr = 20 nchnls = 1
; By Andres Cabrera 2008
instr 1 ; Write fibonacci numbers to file "fibonacci.txt" ; as ascii long integers (mode 7), using the orchestra's ; control rate (iprd = 0)
knumber init 0 koldnumber init 1 ktrans init 1 ktrans = knumber knumber = knumber + koldnumber koldnumber = ktrans dumpk knumber, "fibonacci.txt", 7, 0 printk2 knumber endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
;Write to the file for 1 second. Since control rate is 20, 20 values will be written i 1 0 1
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
